name: Hunt Together
summary:
Includes cross-buy on Rift!**

Challenge your friends in a PvP VR Horror game 👻

Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits 😱 Employ a wide array of items, triggers, and skills tailored to your class to outsmart and defeat your adversary - a terrifying, lifeforce-draining Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter. All of this set in spine-chilling locations such as a haunted Mansion, Mines, or a horrid...
